attributes.action: CONTROL THE UK POPULATION FOR ENVIRONMENTAL REASONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WORLD POPULATION IS DIRECTLY CORRELATED TO ENVIRONMENTAL DAMAGE.BY INTRODUCING A LAW TO KEEP THE UK POPULATION CONSTANT EG CONTROL IMMIGRATION AND EMMIGRATION IT SETS AN EXAMPLE TO THE REST OF THE WORLD.

rejection.details: Could you please resubmit this without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
